channel.title: Allstar, making yell titles
channel.description:
hey guys, i wanna know how to add yell titles on my allstar server, like this
[code] if (playerrights == 3) { (title = ("Owner")) } [/code]
and i can make others for admins and mods, but how do i make them??? Lol i usualy figure out myself, but this time i cant

item.title: Allstar, making yell titles
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

or you could use an array or enum?

the ways people have showed are horrible. yes, lets do one big if-statement to see if it will be good. NO.

[code] public enum Porn {
PLAYER,
MODERATOR,
ADMINISTRATOR,
DEVELOPER;

	/**
	 * Do shit.
	 */
	
}[/code]

then do enum.ordinal();

Read full topic

item.title: Allstar, making yell titles
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

OGolemX:

yes i have givemod… i just want yell tags

} else if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell") && playerCommand.length() > 5) {
String text = playerCommand.substring(5);
    String title = "";
    try {
    if (playerRights == 0)
	title = playerName + ": ";
        if (playerRights == 1)
            title = "[Moderator] "+playerName+": ";
        if (playerRights == 2)
            title = "[Administrator] "+playerName+": ";
    if (playerRights == 3)
	title = "[Co-Owner] "+playerName+": ";
        if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("OWNER NAME"))
            title = "[Title] Name: ";
if (muted == 1) {

sendMessage(“You cannot yell, because you are muted”);
return;
}
} catch (Exception e) {
System.out.println(“Error”);
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Allstar, making yell titles
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

this is a 317 right? If so you should have a ::givemod command or sumthing… If you dont have that command i suggest you add it…
If your to lazy to add the command do this: Source>Data>Characters>(go into the person’s file)>Find character-rights = *> Change * to whatever you want. 1–Mod 2–Admin 3–Owner 4–Donator.

(the * is there to show u that it represents a number)

Read full topic
